document_data.name: Hidden Hand of Fate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hidden Hand of Fate''' was a temple complex dedicated to [[Hoar]], the Doombringer.
document_data.Location: The temple was located within the [[Arch Wood]] in [[Archendale]] in the [[Dalelands]].
document_data.Activities: The temple's influence rose with the decline of Hoar's following in [[Chessenta]]. The temple supported numerous [[bard]]s, bounty hunters, [[assassin]]s and vigilante groups who were active throughout the [[Heartlands]].
